title: King Cage: New Side Load Cages
content: King Cage has long been a staple in cycling water bottle cages and itâ€™s been a while since Ron and his team released a new cage. This Side Load cages allow you to install it for easier access in tight frame spacer. Be it a smaller frame or a full-suspension mountain bike. These are in stock now at King Cage and through your local dealer.
author: prolly
